channel.title: gaming on blog // ~ben
channel.description: Recent content in gaming on blog // ~ben

item.title: pop quiz
item.description:
is this real?

hint: it’s not. it’s the witcher 3. and it looks like a real place.

item.title: vr
item.description:
i picked up an oculus rift after my last paycheck :P

it was half christmas present. these are some of the games that i’m most excited for:

  • elite dangerous
  • lone echo / echo arena
  • dirt rally
  • gun club vr
  • eagle flight
  • robo recall

have you played any other cool vr games lately? are there any that i should check out?

let me know!

item.title: 4k gaming with a gtx1080ti
item.description:
i recently picked up a gtx1080ti on newegg (and a 4k monitor earlier in the summer on prime day). i can’t stop playing the witcher 3. even though it’s a couple years old, it just looks so good. plus, the story and gameplay are incredible as well. i find myself dreaming about the game and longing to play it when i’m not. i’ll have to say it is definitively the best game i’ve ever played.

some of the other games that i’m looking forward to exploring more of in 4k are:

  • destiny 2
  • prey
  • overwatch (not that this will look insanely good, it will just be super silky smooth)
  • fallout 4
  • battlefield 1
  • dishonored
  • dishonored 2
  • dying light
  • battlefront
  • pubg
  • doom (2016)
  • gta5
  • just cause 3
  • hellblade: senua’s sacrifice
  • watch dogs 2
  • many others
